title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Super Bowl Champion Eli Manning. What are his thoughts on the way roughing the passer is being enforced? MLB Network's Chris Russo tells us who he likes to win the World Series, and Roger Bennett of "Men in Blazers" tells us why he's rooting for the USA over England in the World Cup .

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
